title: Factory controller (m/f/d)
description: Our client is a renowned company founded in the mid-1960s that specializes in the development and production of a broad portfolio of sensor solutions and automation components. These products are used in various industries - including automotive, logistics, packaging, food and beverage, pharmaceutical and many others. There they are used to detect objects, measure distances, position machines and monitor processes. The company has branches and sales partners worldwide to offer its products and services internationally. Great importance is placed on innovation and continuous investment is made in research and development in order to be able to offer customers the most modern technologies and solutions in the long term. In order to strengthen the team, we currently have to fill the position of factory controller (m/f/d). Responsibilities are: responsible for the creation and coordination of budget planning as well as monitoring the implementation of coordinated plans and budgets. You evaluate investment plans in terms of their profitability and develop recommendations that you, as a business partner, pass on to management. Another point is the continuous review and adaptation of existing controlling methods, instruments, processes and systems as well as the further development of project controlling. Last but not least, you will of course also be involved in monthly/annual financial statements, particularly in inventory valuation, and analyze the financial accounting reports on results, target/actual deviations and measures.QualificationsIn order to meet the requirements of the position, you should have a degree or have further training with a focus on finance and controlling as well as several years of professional experience in factory or production controlling. The position also requires good knowledge of SAP and MS Office in order to be able to use the relevant tools and systems effectively. Benefits You will find a very pleasant working atmosphere on site. You will be welcomed by a very friendly Director Controlling and given targeted and professional training. You can plan and organize your working hours very flexibly in flexitime and, according to the agreement, you are entitled to 50% home office and 30 days of vacation. The company offers many opportunities to develop personally and professionally in the long term - it is growing very quickly and it Permanent new positions, such as this one, will be created. You should be open to day trips (~15%) to the other location, which is about an hour's drive away. The targeted salary is individually negotiable and, depending on qualifications and experience, is between 75 and 90 thousand euros p.a. With 100% accuracy, a little more could possibly be achieved. On top of that, of course, there are the usual social benefits as well as some great benefits. Just as an aside: When it comes to wage increases, you always follow the collective agreement, even though you are not bound by it, and thus ensure long-term monetary satisfaction for the employees.
